channel.title: CVE Feed for SourceCodester -- Automated Beer Parlour Billing System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SourceCodester -- Automated Beer Parlour Billing System

item.title: CVE-2022-2801|2024-08-03T00:46:04.465Z -- sourcecodester -- automated%20beer%20parlour%20billing%20system
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in SourceCodester Automated Beer Parlour Billing System. This affects an unknown part of the component Login. The manipulation of the argument username leads to sql injection. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-206247.
